text: Paulo Salim Maluf (; born September 3, 1931) is a Brazilian politician. He was the State Governor of São Paulo, Mayor of the City of São Paulo, Congressman and Presidential candidate. As of 2011, Maluf is on a second consecutive term as Federal Deputy. His political base is founded on populism and the provision of major public works.The 10 Interpol Most-Wanted Brazilians in the World. title: Paulo Maluf
